headline: Making Hay of a Cowtown Past
abstract: The Texas city hopes to become a center of sports and entertainment with the opening of Dickies Arena and plans to modernize its Stockyards district.
lead_paragraph: FORT WORTH — Throughout the late 1800s, trail-weary drovers pushed millions of longhorns through Fort Worth’s dusty streets, bestowing the young frontier outpost with an enduring sobriquet: Cowtown.
